title: Uniweb Page Configuration
description: Schema for page.yml files in Uniweb projects

title.description: Page title used in browser tab, navigation, and SEO

description.description: Meta description for SEO and social sharing

label.description: Short navigation label. Defaults to title if not specified

order.description: Sort order for navigation. Lower numbers appear first

pages.description: Child page ordering. First item becomes the index page for this route

index.description: Index page folder name. Alternative to 'pages' array

hidden.description: Hide from all navigation (page still exists and is accessible)

header.description: Whether to render the header on this page

footer.description: Whether to render the footer on this page

leftPanel.description: Whether to render the left sidebar on this page

rightPanel.description: Whether to render the right sidebar on this page

sections.description: Section ordering. Use '*' to auto-discover, an array for explicit order, or nested arrays for hierarchy

oneOf.description: Auto-discover sections from .md files, sort by numeric prefix
Explicit section ordering with optional nesting for subsections

noindex.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this page

image.description: Open Graph image URL for social sharing
